âœ”ï¸ The first general doctor (Hausarzt) you visit will automatically be assigned as your primary doctor.

ğŸ’Š How to Get Prescription Medicine in Austria?

  • Doctors will give you a prescription (Rezept) after your visit.
  • You can buy medicine at any Apotheke (Pharmacy).
  • Pharmacies have emergency services at night and on weekends.

ğŸ“Œ Find the nearest open pharmacy here: Apotheken Notdienst
